summary: Just something I whipped up for Conan Request...
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i57.tinypic.com/14y0pi8.png[/img][/center]

Supporting [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?]Forever Free[/url]

Adds a Armor based on concept art of Howard's Conan, Isn't fancy isn't perfect...MALE ONLY
[b][size=3]Not compatible for lizards and cats![/size][/b]
Upload your [url=#]Pictures[/url] mine not so good! Cheers>>

[u][b][color=#ff0000]Requires[/color][/b][/u] Lastest Skyrim

Yes all is here now....
Added [b][color=#00ffff]Optional Cape-less file[/color][/b] for those who do not desire cape. 

[color=#00ffff]For Helmet[/color] and Gauntlets go to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40914/?]Conan Hyborian Age[/url] !

Same Stats As Studded armor Also Same Crafting and making.

 [u]Not[/u] [u]Improving,[/u] If you want better one then make one better don't PM me about it please and thankyou.

[url=#][u][b][color=#00ff00]INSTALL[/color][/b][/u][/url]: SAME AS REG MODS ARE INSTALLED...
[u][b][color=#ff0000]UNISTALL[/color][/b][/u]: [url=#]DELETE[/url] ALL FILES .nifs, .dds, .esp

[u][b][color=#ff0000]CONFLICTS[/color][/b][/u]: NONE! JUST NOT FOR LIZARDS OR CATS (uses TAIL slot )

[b][u][color=#ff0000]Confused[/color][/u]:[/b] Then I suggest Google 

[color=#00ff00][b][u]Additional Credit[/u] [/b][/color](other then Bethesda) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2095236/?]TSotP[/url] Otherwise I would not have seen this Aspect of Howards Conan, and the Mod would not be here.
author: Sabbath6100
